display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=CxXuS2dLkgUQ7kNvwFLOCNQ&_nc_oc=AdlnUfrVptNiIVeo5RI2uaxElnvljiiXTkrmcjQ4a2kjvBjENsKwjMWu_vf3n66zVL0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=urwmJxXGobzhYZJFw4I6Dw&oh=00_AfEYr5bKa98vKCe51zFVfo-Dh3q91weBKBrMUcrdkuR6xw&oe=68161F9D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=N49xmh3Xb58Q7kNvwHpWyXs&_nc_oc=AdlXPOaHPNbwiABOcs4EQd2z8BJ2Uf47t1oRFL5whcu2XEm5nCvK9qtGDS_GH9zPDgg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=urwmJxXGobzhYZJFw4I6Dw&oh=00_AfFcWthl_1Z0_INgVdI4RzI9FxAr0UJ1rBU7FmekBsgveQ&oe=68163992)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=V7UxnYlC3YMQ7kNvwEgE2LV&_nc_oc=Adl6ozuLEONsJiNg8jgjPlGf2hny_w4DABXFXieIGHTuianwAJUZvQku6a0UW18cXoM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=urwmJxXGobzhYZJFw4I6Dw&oh=00_AfEPW6iMkBxgKuuAdttgw5NUC7rq-HH1FWvXN3XTUyID2Q&oe=68163FA3)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=nn6R3VKnph0Q7kNvwEoUfwC&_nc_oc=Adk-qnCIUQFpPNjWj3YTa29NooneilGATf0gL84_qta7Ocpc6TW9IFDl1NtTSAi-QZk&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=urwmJxXGobzhYZJFw4I6Dw&oh=00_AfE3m_C_UmBb2ZzSM8QimHO508EgqGVEVXVq3Ot-Sk3b_Q&oe=6816362E)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=rELCOT4xe8AQ7kNvwGUMJC_&_nc_oc=AdmXFMkHzSBX9iTh1zjW4Z4ocaaYnhoNySx-uoxpn6KvWRxRlKuh8iZJRFD7WdrxHmE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=urwmJxXGobzhYZJFw4I6Dw&oh=00_AfH4B_id5T5yrczKZB94XmwopdGQ-3ETmOj_kmriKzEIdg&oe=68163E16)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
